alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:46AM CDT until March 26 at 12:09PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water is flowing over Gunshoot Road near steens. Low lying areas along sand road, black creek road, and near yellow creek are flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 16.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Luxapallila Creek Columbus 15.0 7.7 Tue 8 am CDT 9.8 15.3 15.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
